title: MD
biography: National Order of Merit. Associated with Cayetano Heredia University.
aiSummary: Patricia García is a public health specialist with an H-index of 57 at Cayetano Heredia University (Member). Has been published in The Lancet, New England Journal of Medicine, The Lancet Infectious Diseases. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
